name: fsbo_warning
title: Things you should know about For Sale By Owner properties
label: FSBO Tips
description:
Important considerations when dealing with properties that are For Sale By Owner.

FSBO transactions don't include professional real estate representation for the seller. You may need to take additional steps to ensure all required disclosures are provided. Communication and negotiation will be directly with the property owner. Consider hiring a real estate attorney to review any post-acceptance documentation. Ensure all state-required forms and disclosures are properly completed.

While FSBO transactions can be successful, it's recommended to work with qualified professionals to ensure your interests are protected throughout the process.
tips: FSBO transactions may require additional due diligence and documentation on your part.
small_print: This information is provided for educational purposes and does not constitute legal advice. Consider consulting with a real estate attorney for specific guidance.

internal.notes: Informational screen triggered by FSBO selection. No user input required.
